title: Enter Workflow
description: Triggers when somebody visits a specified page

title: Event occurred
description: Triggers when somebody performs a specified action

title: Time has passed
description: Triggers after a specified amount of time

title: Exit Workflow
description: Triggers when a specified error happens

title: Push Action
description: Push notification based on the action definition

title: SMS Action
description: SMS Messages will be sent out based on the action definition

title: E-mail Action
description: Email Communication will be sent out based on the action definition

title: Web Api Action
description: Web Api will be sent out based on the action definition
